name: Stephan's Sour
description: A simple gin sour given a boost of character and flavor by the addition of celery bitters, Stephan's Sour is a classically styled drink from Seattle bartender Murray Stenson, winner of the "American Bartender of the Year" award at last week's Tales of the Cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce simple syrup (equal parts sugar and water, mixed until sugar dissolves)
2 dashes The Bitter Truth celery bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds; strain into chilled cocktail glass.
